title: Add markdown accessibility linting for content entries
description: Introduce a content lint step that checks markdown accessibility requirements across all entries (beans, equipment, roasters, recipes). Validate that every markdown image has non-empty alt text and that heading levels follow the expected hierarchy (H2 section headers, H3 subsection headers, no skipped levels).
acceptance_criteria: - CI runs the a11y lint on PRs and fails on violations\n- Image syntax requires non-empty alt text (e.g., ![Alt](/beans/images/...) )\n- Heading structure enforces H2 then H3 (no H1/H4 skips) and flags out-of-order headings

title: Add CI content integrity checks for bean entry backlinks
description: Add a pull-request CI check that validates bean content referential integrity across collections. The check should parse the Astro content collections and ensure any slugs referenced from bean frontmatter (roaster, roast, brewer, recipe, grinder, gear) resolve to existing entries.
acceptance_criteria: - CI runs on PRs and fails if referential integrity is broken\n- Validation covers beans, equipment, roasters, recipes, and other linked collections\n- Each content entity includes a Markdown 'References' section with named links for backlinks, and the checker enforces presence + link target validity
